https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qcLQiA205hmDYtuzGa82fHwjoMv.jpg On a summer evening, a dance in the village brings together young and old. Children, lovers, drinkers and troublemakers all revel under the night sky, accompanied by a variety of musical styles. A Summer Night Rendez-vous
